events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it because it is not what I expected and would like a full refund.
The system has detected keywords related to refund and return to classify the issue appropriately.
Assigning the case to customer service specialist agent responsible for refunds and returns.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request, please provide your order number.
Could you please confirm the reason for the return and whether the product is unopened or used?
The product did not match the description on the website, and I have not opened the package yet.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once the product is returned to our warehouse.
That sounds good to me. Please let me know how I should send the product back.
I’m sending you the return instructions and shipping label via email. Please confirm once you receive it.
I have received the return instructions and shipping label. I will send the package tomorrow.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. You should see the money back on your card within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the refund has been received. Thank you for the prompt support and clear instructions.
Closing this case now as the refund process is completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
